name: Party Animal
description:
Party Animal You are the host of the wildest party in town. If you want everybody having a good time, you need to KEEP IT ALIVE!

As every wolf know, there are four things every party must have: amazing music, good vibes, cold drinks and a dancefloor free of your friends dinner!
Keep your headphones on to enjoy the different sound effects we added to the game.

DISCLAIMER:
  • When playing the game on the web often the resolution isn’t right, just click on full-screen to enjoy the full experience.
  • No Animals Were Harmed in the Making of This Videogame.
HOW TO PLAY

There are four bars which shows you the stats of the party: Music, Vibes, Drinks and Cleaness.
If everithing goes fine they will grow, making your party the best in town!
But you have to take care of them.

  • Music: to keep the crew tamed, ChimpDJ is your ape. You will be the one cracking a cold one to the famous DJ, so you just go the bridge, take a drink and bring it to him.
  • Vibes: as more friends come to the party, fights can appear. But you are lucky, old bro’ Jimmy is here to give you a paw. If a fight tries to kill the mood, just go to the pinball machine and take your bro with you. His mere presence will stop the fights!
  • Drinks: dancing makes people thirsty! that’s why you have to refill the fridge with drinks time to time. In order to do that, take a six-pack from the front door and bring them to the fridge in the kitchen.
  • Cleaness: nothing kills a party more than dancing over somelse dinner, so pick the mop in the bathroom and clean it before everybody leaves your party. Just remember to bring back the mop to the bathroom .
CONTROLS

Interaction: Left Control or Space

Movement: Arrows or WASD

Exit: ESC

Prepared or not, Welcome To the Jungle! Credit
